author: Lesley Waters
method: Cook the sweet potato in boiling water until just tender.  Drain.  In a pan heat the olive oil and add the red onions and ground coriander.  Cook for 2-3 minutes.  Add the sweet potatoes to the pan with the red onion, stir in the fresh coriander and cook until golden.
ingredients: 1 sweet potato, diced,  3 tbsp olive oil,  ½ red onion, chopped ,  1 tsp ground coriander ,  3 tbsp fresh coriander, chopped
